channel.title: CVE Feed for Advantech -- WebAccess
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Advantech -- WebAccess

item.title: CVE-2021-38389|2024-08-04T01:37:16.503Z -- advantech -- webaccess
item.description: Advantech WebAccess versions 9.02 and prior are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute code.

item.title: CVE-2019-3940|2024-08-04T19:26:27.481Z -- advantech -- webaccess
item.description: Advantech WebAccess 8.3.4 is vulnerable to file upload attacks via unauthenticated RPC call. An unauthenticated, remote attacker can use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2019-3941|2024-08-04T19:26:27.534Z -- advantech -- webaccess
item.description: Advantech WebAccess 8.3.4 allows unauthenticated, remote attackers to delete arbitrary files via IOCTL 10005 RPC.
